Trade/Device Name(s): Alere INRatio2 PT/INR Monitoring System (Professional Use)
Alere INRatio2 PT/INR Home Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere INRatio2 PT/INR Monitoring Systems (Professional and Home) for quantitative INR/PT measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Used for quantitative determination of INR in fresh capillary whole blood to monitor the effect of warfarin therapy on clotting time by healthcare professionals and properly trained home users; not intended for use in patients transitioning from heparin to warfarin therapy and not for screening purposes
